thread.title: BRIEF-DTE Energy Says To Double Renewable Energy Capacity By Early 2020s

title: BRIEF-DTE Energy Says To Double Renewable Energy Capacity By Early 2020s

organizations.name: brief-dte energy says to double renewable energy c

text:
March 30, 2018 / 1:13 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-DTE Energy Says To Double Renewable Energy Capacity By Early 2020s Reuters Staff 
March 30 (Reuters) - Dte Energy Co: 
* SAYS SUBMITTED ITS 2018 RENEWABLE ENERGY PLAN TO MICHIGAN PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION 
* DTE ENERGY - PLAN PROPOSES ABOUT 1,000 ADDITIONAL MEGAWATTS OF CARBON-FREE ELECTRICITY FROM NEW WIND AND SOLAR PROJECTS IN MICHIGAN 
* DTE ENERGY - PROPOSED RENEWABLE ENERGY PLAN SCHEDULED TO BE COMPLETED BY 2022 
* DTE ENERGY SAYS ITS PLAN INTENDS TO DOUBLE DTEâ€™S RENEWABLE ENERGY CAPACITY FROM 1,000 MEGAWATTS TO 2,000 MEGAWATTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
